title: Black Mirror: Bandersnatch
creator_credit: Charlie Brooker, Russell McLean, Caroline Harris, Catrin Meredydd, David Slade and House of Tomorrow
headline_credit: United Kingdom and United States of America, 2018
brief_description: In 1984, a young programmer begins to question reality as he adapts a dark fantasy novel into a video game. A mind-bending tale with multiple endings.

constellations_other.name: The power of alternate endings
constellations_other.description: This Constellation about alternate perspectives, dream states, sitcoms and spin-offs was made by Swinburne Cinema and Screen Studies student Daniel Bryan.
